text:
Xerces ver: 2.7
Xalan ver: 1.9
ICU ver: 3.4
compiler: VC++ 2002

I built Xerces+ICU and the parsing MFC application.
When my application window closed and end to ExitInstance(), general protection
error happened (read address:0xC0000005 place:0x00000000).
In other case, if application don't call parse functions, these errors don't 
happen.
Its parse is validating parse and DOM creating.
creator: h.shibuya@vertexsystems.co.jp

Does xerces (especially, debugging version) consume a large amount of 
heap areas?
Xerces destroys even the area of MFC and the application program.
creator: h.shibuya@vertexsystems.co.jp
crossley@apache.org
text:
You need to describe this bug to the Xerces project.
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ

I am marking this as "Invalid" because it is nothing to do with the "Apache XML
Commons" project.

This is a bug report against Xerces-C++, it should be opened here:
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESC not 
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ.
creator: mrglavas@ca.ibm.com
